fields.description:
I have scrollableView which have infinite views within it, So tend to use VirtualScroller available as open source, and its doing pretty good job in iOS version applications, But when it comes to Android it crashes randomly. I am giving the log here.

fields.environment: CLI version 3.2.1, Titanium SDK version 3.2.0.GA, Android application stops unexpectedly.

comments.body: It appears that you are running into an issue with VirtualScroller module on Android. You should contact the module author for this issue as this module is not provided by us.
